title: Correction to: Succession and persistence of microbial communities and antimicrobial resistance genes associated with International Space Station environmental surfaces
authors: Nitin Kumar Singh, Jason M. Wood, Fathi Karouia, Kasthuri Venkateswaran
full_text:
Correction to: Microbiome (2018) 6:204
10.1186/s40168-018-0585-2 Following publication of the original article [1], the authors reported a typographic error in scientific notation in the number of reads, the text should read as: “Approximately 7.3 × 108 reads associated with microorganisms were generated after high quality trimming from PMA (21 samples) and non-PMA treated (21 samples) samples. All metagenomics reads were normalized across all samples, which yielded 3.1 × 108 in total, and 7.4 × 106 assigned to each sample, without affecting the taxonomic diversity.” The authors regret these errors and the inconvenience caused.
